pages.text: Requirements: $(li)Be in the Nether $(li)8 Basalts Any $(li)16 Blackstone Any $(li)4 Glowstone
An example of how the ritual can be placed.

The Nether is a dimension full of Soul Energy, as shown with the endless amounts of Soul Sand that littered the realm. However, there still needs structure to create Nether related artifacts to focus the abundance into one place. The Blackstone and Basalt can be of any kind.
